title: Religio laici written in a letter to John Dryden, Esq.
author: Blount, Charles, 1654-1693.
publisher: Printed for R. Bentley and S. Magnes ...,
notes: The "epistle dedicatory" signed: C.B. [i.e. Charles Blount] Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.); DNB.
"The 'Religio laici,' which professes to be supplementary to Dryden's poem of the same name (1682) was, in fact, chiefly taken from Herbert's treatise 'De religione laici.'"--DNB.
Reproduction of original in Folger Library.
